Goodevas Indoor Playgrounds

Kids playground indoor is generally considered to be a place for entertainment. Thoughtful designs from Goodevas contribute to the development of the child and allow him or her to learn to adapt to the new environment. If you are a fan of the Montessori method and want to combine useful with pleasure, pay attention to indoor playset.

For your convenience, we have divided our children's designs into different categories. They are suitable for children of different ages. Here you will find playsets that will allow kids to develop their imagination, creativity and physical abilities. All you have to do is choose the option that best suits your child's needs and interests, and they will find a lot of fun and excitement in it.

The best products - what do we offer?

Each product item has a different impact on a child's activity and development. In our assortment you can find:

1. Swedish walls

This family play set gives kids a chance to have adventures in their home. Made of natural wood, the set includes many elements, such as gymnastic rings, a rope step, a swing rope, a movable bar, a slide and horizontal bars. The slide and climbing ramp are dual purpose, allowing children to ride or climb. The second item can be used as a bridge and can also be attached to the triangular ladder. The disc swing is made of wood and is suitable for children from 3 to 12 years old. Gymnastic rings allow you to paddle and develop stamina. The set consists of crossbars that can be used for pull-ups, hanging, and kicking. Due to its multifunctionality, it takes up more space, but can be easily removed from the wall and transformed into a pickler triangle or folded for storage. 

This set is designed to provide children with the opportunity for movement and creativity, while building strength, coordination and motor skills. If you need a playground inside house, this is the perfect option. 

If children like to play outside, the included swing can be placed there. Swedish walls are characterized by high durability and safety. Capable of supporting up to 110 lbs (50 kg), it provides reliability and safety during use, yet is very lightweight for carrying and installation. For convenience, there are more detailed design parameters:

Width

Height

Depth

23.62 inches (60 cm)

6.82 feet (208 cm)

41 inches (104 cm)


2. Playhouses

Provide your child with a wooden indoor playground by purchasing a playhouse. This is a miniature of adult life that will stimulate your child's imagination and independence. The subcategory rearranges several house options complete with a slide, three swings and a pikler  triangle. It is a versatile design as it can also be used as a bed if you place the mattress on the bottom.

The indoor wooden playhouse with triangular ladder, slide board and swings is a popular model among buyers and weighs 72 pounds (33 kg). As a result, you can count on a reliable construction that has strong features.

3. Climbing Dome

Such a kid playground indoor will add movement, improve physical skills and coordination. It is the largest complex in Gudevas which can hold up to 7 children at a time. Its sturdiness is proven, as it has been tested with a static load of 350+ kg. Made of eco-friendly plywood with natural wood glue, the construction ensures safety and reliability. If your child loves to explore something new at home or outdoors, pay attention to the climbing dome.

The structure is made of wood (beech dowels) and has the following dimensions:

Overall dimensions

35.4” x 70.8” (90 x 180 cm)

Weight

46.3 lb (21 kg)

Recommended age range

3-6 years old

Weight limit

up to 110 lb (50 kg)


4. Playgrounds

This subcategory features several Playgrounds options complete with a slide, three swings, and a speaker triangle. Environmentally friendly birch plywood was chosen as the base. It is also possible to order the Playgrounds with a climbing net, which has a positive effect on children's coordination. Playgrounds is really sturdy and this is confirmed by the following parameters:

Size

46.92" x 44.96" x 56.61" (119.2 x 114.2 x 143.8 cm)

Weight

61.73 lb (28 kg)

You can use the cabin as a bed if you put a mattress on the bottom. Among its main advantages are its affordable price and the fact that it can be used by several children at the same time.

Shop by Age Group

Our indoor playgrounds meet the needs of different age groups. For example, training complexes are suitable for children from 6 months to 7 years old. 1 year old indoor playground - these are our houses that are suitable for children under 7 years old. This is the perfect place for a child to test their energy and develop a vision. 

The dome house is designed for children from 2 to 6 years old. If your child is very active, this design will allow them to embody their energy and enjoy it.

Benefits of Wooden Playgrounds

Indoor playground for a home is an ideal design, aimed at your child's development. It is related to the Montessori methodology, which is designed to develop their natural interests and skills. As a result, children can independently familiarize themselves with the design, and explore its features, while having an interesting time.

Another advantage of an indoor playground for kids is its aesthetics. Different designs allow you to maintain the comfort of your home. This has a positive effect on the mood of both adults and children.

Safety & Assembly

Our company invests great efforts in ensuring the safety of our products and ensures that all playgrounds indoors meet the CE and CPC certificates. All of our products have the appropriate certificates confirming their reliability and compliance with regulatory requirements. We use high-quality materials and conduct thorough quality control at all stages of production.

Each model of indoor home playground is supported by a detailed instruction manual, which will allow you to quickly and easily understand all the nuances. Additionally, we have prepared video lessons that everyone can watch on our website. It makes life easier, so following our recommendations will ensure a simple and reliable installation. If you still have questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Conclusion

The best indoor playsets for toddlers are guaranteed to have a positive impact on your child. With these structures, the child improves their strength, stamina, and coordination. The activities also strengthen the immune system, making the body more resistant to infections.
